entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
